title: City Park 5K Run
description: Join us for a casual 5K run through beautiful City Park. All fitness levels welcome! Refreshments provided after the run.

title: Winter Half Marathon
description: Challenge yourself with our scenic half marathon route along the river. Medals for all finishers and prizes for top performers.

title: Trail Running Adventure
description: Explore the beautiful mountain trails in this guided group run. 10K and 15K route options available. Post-run snacks and social gathering included.
